DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effectiveness of a prefixed 50% N2O- 50%O2 mixture in legal abortion under paracervical block.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of of a Prefixed 50% N2O- 50%O2 Mixture in Legal Abortion Under Local Analgesia
DOC.criteria: Major patient having signed an assent waits having chosen to make the intervention under local anesthetic Minor contraindication in the use of the paracetamol, the lidocaine Porphyries
